VGServer::ByteInBuffer

VGServer::ByteInBuffer Class Reference

ByteInBuffer is a cursor class to ByteBuffer implementing extraction functions used in the graph client parser to securely access the byte blob returned by the server. More...

#include <ByteInBuffer.h>

void rewind ()
 reset the cursor

Detailed Description

ByteInBuffer is a cursor class to ByteBuffer implementing extraction functions used in the graph client parser to securely access the byte blob returned by the server.
